osvSchema.details: In da, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08477148; Issue ID: ALPS08477148.

description_data.value: In da, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08477148; Issue ID: ALPS08477148.

descriptions.value: In da, there is a possible out of bounds write due to a missing bounds check. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with System execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation. Patch ID: ALPS08477148; Issue ID: ALPS08477148.

En da, existe una posible escritura fuera de los límites debido a una verificación de los límites faltantes. Esto podría conducir a una escalada local de privilegios con permisos de ejecución de System necesarios. La interacción del usuario no es necesaria para la explotación. ID de parche: ALPS08477148; ID del problema: ALPS08477148.
